skills.name: Void Fission
skills.desc: Enhances Disaster's Right Hand, restoring its Toughness.

skills.name: Calamity Strike
skills.desc: Enhances Dawn's Left Hand, restoring its Toughness.

skills.name: Engine Boost
skills.desc: Grants the Enhanced status to all friendly units except the user, restoring their Toughness.

skills.name: Total Annihilation
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cataclysm Precursor
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. The next action uses "Impending Doom" on all targets.

skills.name: Impending Doom
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Engine Slit
skills.desc: The Antimatter Engine will change its Weakness Type every time it recovers from Weakness Break.
